message.content: Hey, can you help me set up a FastAPI project? I want to build a REST API for my task management app.

content.text: Sure! Let me help you set up a FastAPI project for your task management app.

input.command: mkdir -p taskmanager/app && cd taskmanager && uv init

message.content: I want to use PostgreSQL for the database. I've tried SQLite before but it can't handle concurrent writes well enough.

content.text: Good choice! PostgreSQL handles concurrent writes much better than SQLite. Let me set up SQLAlchemy with asyncpg for async PostgreSQL support.

message.content: Actually, can we use Tortoise ORM instead? I find SQLAlchemy too verbose.

content.text: Sure, Tortoise ORM is a great choice for FastAPI â€” it's more Pythonic and has first-class async support. Let me update the setup.

message.content: Thanks! By the way, my name is Alex and I'm a backend engineer. I prefer concise code examples over long explanations.

content.text: Got it, Alex! I'll keep things brief and code-focused. Here's the Tortoise ORM setup:
